transcript: you get more out of reading one book that's great five times than out of reading five mediocre books I will read a book two times three times four times five times then once I have like squeezed the book for everything that it has to the point where I can convey the message to somebody else like I can teach the concepts of the book which is something I've done many times I'll actually make a presentation on the book so that I can wrap my own Frameworks around how I can remember it that's where a lot of these framers come from is because it's me trying to make sense of the world in a way that I can remember
